content.question: A. Describe the land survey method that resulted in the spatial pattern shown in Image 1. B. Describe an advantage of the land survey method used in Oxfordshire. C. Explain the process of diffusion by which the land survey method shown in Image 1 arrived in the St. Lawrence River valley. D. Explain how local-food movements in Oxfordshire may affect patterns of land use in this area. E. Explain ONE disadvantage of changing the scale of these images to 1:1,000,000 for interpreting rural land use patterns.

skill.text: Skill 4.E: Explain how maps, images, and landscapes illustrate, or relate to geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
